title: Prikladnai︠a︡ Matematika i Mekhanika
aka: Journal of Applied Mathematics and Mechanics
additional-notes: We did not find renewals filed either for the original Russian publication, or for the English translation 'Applied Mathematics and Mechanics' published from 1958 to 2018 by Pergamon Press and Elsevier. However, the GATT restoration mentioned below may also mean that the translations are covered by copyright, for the originals if nothing else.

This is a Russian publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Timothy Wells for copyright research on this title.
